definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: incite to make a request (c. acc. pers. + inf.) Ju Jdg 1:14 (on text v. GFM) = Jos 15:18.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: allure [[מִמֶּנּוּ וַיְסִיתֵם]] 2Ch 18:31 and God allured them away fr. him (si vera l.; del. cl. as gloss Be Kit); so also Job 36:16 acc. to De Hi Bu al.; he allureth thee out of the mouth of distress, but Di Du freedom hath seduced thee; for meaning seduce, entice, cf. also v:Job 36:18.

instigate, in bad sense, c. acc. pers., + [[בְּ]] against, 1Sa 26:19, 2Sa 24:1, Je 43:3, Job 2:3; c. acc. pers. alone 1Ki 21:25, 2Ki 18:32 = Is 36:18, cf. 2Ch 32:15, De 13:7 Je 38:22; + inf. 1Ch 21:1, 2Ch 18:2, 2Ch 32:11.
